metadata.Name: WikiOmnia
metadata.Description: WikiOmnia is a generative question answering corpus based on the whole Russian Wikipedia.
metadata.Paper Title: WikiOmnia: generative QA corpus on the whole Russian Wikipedia
Affiliations: Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University
metadata.Abstract: We present WikiOmnia, a new generative question answering (QA) corpus based on the whole Russian Wikipedia. The corpus contains 100K question-answer pairs automatically generated from Wikipedia articles. We use a pipeline based on the T5-based model ruT5 to generate questions from article summaries. The generated questions are diverse and cover a wide range of topics. We evaluate the quality of the generated questions using several metrics, including BLEU, ROUGE, and METEOR. We also evaluate the performance of several state-of-the-art QA models on the WikiOmnia corpus. The results show that WikiOmnia is a challenging and informative QA corpus that can be used to train and evaluate QA models for the Russian language.
